code:
```mermaid
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Pending: Create Refund

    Pending --> Authorized: Auto-Approve (<$100)
    Pending --> Authorized: Manual Authorization
    Pending --> Canceled: Denied/Canceled
    Pending --> Failed: Validation Failed

    Authorized --> Processing: Start Processing
    Authorized --> Canceled: Cancel Before Processing

    Processing --> Completed: Success
    Processing --> Failed: Processing Error
    Processing --> Retry: Temporary Failure

    Retry --> Processing: Retry Attempt
    Retry --> Failed: Max Retries Exceeded
    Retry --> Canceled: Manual Cancel

    Failed --> Retry: Manual Retry
    Failed --> Canceled: Give Up

    Completed --> [*]
    Canceled --> [*]

    note right of Pending
        Initial state
        Awaiting authorization
        Time limit: 7 days
    end note

    note right of Authorized
        Ready for processing
        Auto-approved: <$100
        Manual: ≥$100
    end note

    note right of Processing
        Active refund
        Payment method specific
        Lightning/On-chain
    end note

    note right of Completed
        Terminal state
        Funds returned
        Receipt generated
    end note

    note right of Failed
        Terminal state (unless retry)
        Error recorded
        Notification sent
    end note
```
